original_text: He will hold you in his hand like a ball and he will throw you far away. You will die in that large, open country. Your great chariots will be useless there with you. You have brought shame to your master's family.” He will hold you in his hand like a ball and he will throw you far away. You will die in that large, open country. Your great chariots will be useless there with you. You have brought shame to your master's family.”
korean_text: 반드시 너를 모질게 감싸서 공 같이 광막한 곳에 던질 것이라 주인의 집에 수치를 끼치는 너여 네가 그 곳에서 죽겠고 네 영광의 수레도 거기에 있으리라

sentences.original_text: He will hold you in his hand like a ball
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 공처럼 당신을 손에 들 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and he will throw you far away
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 당신을 멀리 던질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You will die in that large, open country
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그 넓은, 열린 땅에서 죽을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Your great chariots will be useless there
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 위대한 전차들은 거기서 쓸모없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: You have brought shame to your master's family
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 주인의 가족에게 수치를 가져왔습니다
